entry.title: Medium Tillandsia Xerographica - 3 for $30 Special - Limited Time
entry.summary:
Vendor: Air Plant City
Type:
Price: 30.00 - 90.00 (3 variants)

  • Description
  • Size
    • MEDIUM XEROGRAPHICA 3 for $3. Coupon codes do not apply to this special price: Silvery light green in color, Xerographica is one of the more rare varieties. Thick, wide leaves form a tight rosette of curls with the thin, spiky new growth sprouting from the center adding a beautiful contrast in form.
    • DISPLAY: The large Xerographicas looks beautiful on its own while the small plants look great when grouped in multiples.
    • COLOR: Minty green with tinges of pin. Spectacular blossom when in bloom.
    • WATER: Soak once a week. Leave upside so that water drips out of the center.
    • MOUNTING: Great for large displays and driftwood
    • NATIVE HABITAT: Mexico and Guatemala
  • Size Height Width
    Medium 3-4 Inches 5-6 Inches

  • Size
  • Wholesale Information
    • IONANTHA RUBRA: A soft, lotus-like Ionantha with watermelon-green leaves. Our biggest Ionanthas we have available. 
    • FORM: Ionanthas are one of the classic air plants that everyone must have in their collection. They are small, hardy, round, and have many uses. Spiky green foliage sprouts out from a round base and they will surprise you with their blooming colors.

entry.title: Curly Tillandsia Streptophylla - Pure - Air Plants
entry.summary:
Vendor: Air Plant City
Type: air plant
Price: 7.95 - 11.95 (3 variants)

  • Description
  • Size
    • FORM: Streptophylla Air Plants are a curly, irregular tillandsia with thick, pastel-green leaves. The ends of the leaves have the tendency to curl under the base of the plant. Some have commented that Streptophylla look like a very small xerographica. These are currently available in very limited quantities.

    • MOUNTING: Mounts well on Wood.

entry.title: Pack of 6 or 12 Hanging Metal Pendants Hangers with Assorted Air Plants - Save 40%
entry.summary:
Vendor: Air Plant City
Type: terrarium
Price: 32.22 - 64.44 (2 variants)

  • Description
  • Size
    1. Our handcrafted metal pendants are a simple way to suspend tillandsia in air. Gently place a single plant in the lower diamond of the frame and hang in a bright spot in your home, office or studio. These iron structures will not rust or discolor from moisture as they are dipped in a plant-safe sealant. Every pendant comes with an air plant, hand-selected to fit perfectly inside the metal frame. 
    2. Great gift idea!
    3. Each set includes assorted the plants
  • Holder Plants
      2 Inches Wide, 6.5 Inches Tall 2-4 Inches Tall

entry.title: Gift Wrapping
entry.summary:
Vendor: Air Plant City
Type: terrarium
Price: 5.00

Add this listing to your cart and we will gift wrap your order.

Please note that some large or wholesale orders cannot be gift wrapped. However, we can gift wrap almost anything purchased on the retail side of our website, including: air plant variety packs, terrariums, containers, ceramic, driftwood, sea shells with air plants, mopani and grapewood arrangements. 

Don't Forget to add your personalized Gift Note in the "Notes to Air Plant City" during checkout. These will print out on the gift receipt.

entry.title: Packs of 3 or 6 Small Cork Bark Slabs with Assorted Air Plants + Waterproof Glue - Save 25%
entry.summary:
Vendor: Air Plant City
Type: air plant
Price: 33.63 - 67.27 (2 variants)

  • Description
  • Size
    1. Cork bark is a perfect medium for displaying air plants, orchids and bromeliads. You can create beautiful wall hangings by attaching a wire and mounting screw. Cork bark replicates one of the air plants' favorite natural hosts, the branches and trunks of tropical trees. For each piece of cork bark measuring about 4 X 6 inches, you will receive 3 air plants. Buy a 3 pack and receive 3 pieces of cork bark and 9 air plants. Buy a 6 pack and receive 6 pieces of cork bark and 18 air plants. These are a great size for unique crafts and hand-made gifts.
  • Size Dimensions  Included Plants Per Piece
    Small 4 X 6 in 3

entry.title: Natural Cholla Cactus Containers with Assorted Air Plants
entry.summary:
Vendor: Air Plant City
Type: air plant
Price: 8.95 - 44.78 (6 variants)

  • Description
  • Size
    1. Cholla is a cactus found in the desert Southwest USA and Northern Mexico. After several years, old wood naturally dies and can be removed from the plants. After an intensive cleaning and removal of the thorns, we are left with a unique product that is great for displaying air plants. You can display the container vertically to easily fit one plant or sideways and you can use the many holes to display multiple plants.
    2. One assorted air plant is included for every container
  • Size Height Width
    Regular 3 Inches

    About 2.5 Inches
    Large 6 Inches About 2.5 Inches
